code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{Button,ButtonGroup,Container,Table}from'reactstrap';import AppNavbar from'./AppNavbar';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProductList=()=>{const[products,setProducts]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{setLoading(true);fetch('/api/products').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>{setProducts(data);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."});}const productList=products.map(product=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{style:{whiteSpace:'nowrap'},children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:product.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/images/"+product.name+"/image.png"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("td",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(ButtonGroup,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{size:"sm",color:"primary",tag:Link,to:"/products/"+product.id,children:"View"})})})]},product.id);});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AppNavbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{class:"mb-5",children:"\xA0"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{fluid:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Best Selling Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Table,{className:"mt-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("thead",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("tr",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{width:"20%",children:"Name"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{width:"20%",children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("th",{width:"10%",children:"Actions"})]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("tbody",{children:productList})]})]})]});};export default ProductList;
